channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: An American In Austen
channel.desc: Having given up on searching for the man of her dreams, Harriet is transported into the world of Pride and Prejudice to find one. No man can compare to Mr Darcy - can they.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Fourth Down and Love
channel.desc: Sparks fly as a single mother bumps into a professional American football player from her past at her daughter's playing field. Will the pair kick things off or fumble once more.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Journey Ahead
channel.desc: Embark on an epic road trip as two strangers - a famous actress and a young wilderness expert - drive from LA to New York together, learning life-changing lessons along the way.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Game, Set, Love
channel.desc: Former tennis pro Taylor reluctantly agrees to coach her friend Will for a mixed doubles tournament, only to find there is a lot more to him than she thought.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Love's Fast Lane
channel.desc: After a video of her goes viral, a mechanic finds herself falling for a charming publicist as they aim to turn her into the first female host of the world's biggest car show.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Destination Love
channel.desc: When Madison travels to New Zealand to plan her best friend's wedding, she finds the perfect location, but loses her heart to the idyllic vineyard's owner.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Crimetime
channel.desc: A crime series actress returns to her home town where she encounters her first real case. Can her TV crime knowledge save the day? Mystery drama with Lyndie Greenwood.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Planning On Forever
channel.desc: Busy events planner Emma doesn't have time for love, but could the charming best man at her sister's wedding convince her to give romance - and him - a second chance.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Marry Go Round
channel.desc: Abby has a great job, a man she wants to marry and she's moving to Paris. Life is great, until she discovers that her divorce from high-school sweetheart Luke isn't exactly official.

channel.title: Love In The Limelight
channel.desc: Pen pals with Nick for years, Summer is reluctant for her relationship with him to go public when the former boy band singer comes to town for a comeback concert.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Junebug
channel.desc: 40-year-old book editor Juniper is magically reconnected with an eight-year-old version of herself who questions her life choices, including the dream of writing her own stories.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Unthinkably Good Things
channel.desc: Three friends reunite in Tuscany, where they relish in the importance of friendship and inspire each other to make their next year the best one yet.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Missed Connection
channel.desc: Five years after finding a spark with a stranger on a train platform, a photographer finds himself seated next to the same woman on a plane heading to the same wedding - hers.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Campfire Romance
channel.desc: Romance rekindles for Peyton and her closest friends when her parents decide to host a holiday themed reunion before selling their family owned summer camp.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Perfect Harmony
channel.desc: Best Man Jack and Maid of Honour Professor Barrett may not sing from the same hymn sheet, but working together on their friends' wedding might just result in a duet of a lifetime.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Food For The Heart
channel.desc: Chef and owner of The Loving Spoonful, Lia, learns how to accept help - and love - when she tries to expand her food delivery business.

channel.desc: When a psychic tells Charlotte she is destined to marry her best friend, Rory, only one thing stands in her way. his fianc?e.
